properties.name: spring.rocketmq.name-server
properties.description: name server  名称服务器，保存broker的元数据

properties.name: spring.rocketmq.producer-compress-msg-body-over-how-much
properties.description: Compress message body threshold, namely, message body larger than 4k will be compressed on default.

properties.name: spring.rocketmq.producer-group-name
properties.description: name of producer 生产组名称

properties.name: spring.rocketmq.producer-max-message-size
properties.description: Maximum allowed message size in bytes.

properties.name: spring.rocketmq.producer-retry-another-broker-when-not-store-ok
properties.description: Indicate whether to retry another broker on sending failure internally.

properties.name: spring.rocketmq.producer-retry-times-when-send-async-failed
properties.description:
Maximum number of retry to perform internally before claiming sending failure in asynchronous mode.

This may potentially cause message duplication which is up to application developers to resolve.

properties.name: spring.rocketmq.producer-retry-times-when-send-failed
properties.description:
Maximum number of retry to perform internally before claiming sending failure in synchronous mode.

This may potentially cause message duplication which is up to application developers to resolve.

properties.name: spring.rocketmq.producer-send-msg-timeout
properties.description: millis of send message timeout 生产者发送消息超时时间(毫秒)
